archimate:Requirement.name: PM.2.2.4d: d) methods for restricting physical access to the organisation's facilities (e.g. verifying the identities of strangers or individuals external to the organisation who have requested physical access, and requiring them to follow documented access management procedures).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
